channel.title: Strange, need help
channel.description:
Well. I tried compiling the server and it didn't work. THEN I tried it on the client, and it worked. So what do I do?
[code]@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit[/code]
[code]Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
THEN I check the server, and it hasn't worked.

@str8golden wrote:

dont feel bad… im nailed with this… Error: SignLink.method2685:183 SignLink.:985 Applet_Sub1.method40:265 clie
nt.main:865 | java.lang.RuntimeException

cant get mine up either -.- i got 6 months of work on my rsps…

Read full topic

java -cp bin;lib/clientlibs.jar client 0 live english game0

item.title: Strange, need help
item.dc:creator: @kieran-b kieran-b-
item.description:
@kieran-b wrote:

hmm try this make shure you put your jdk in there tho lol

@echo off
Title frostscape complier
cd …
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./Bulby/./io/*.java
pause

item.title: Strange, need help

item.description:
@Top_Glitch wrote:

Well. I tried compiling the server and it didn’t work. THEN I tried it on the client, and it worked. So what do I do?

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

THEN I check the server, and it hasn’t worked.
